TABLE.NAME: qtype_randomsamatch_options
TABLE.COMMENT: Info about a random short-answer matching question

FIELD.NAME: choose
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of subquestions to randomly generate.

FIELD.NAME: subcats
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to include or not the subcategories.

FIELD.NAME: correctfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any correct response.

FIELD.NAME: partiallycorrectfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any partially correct response.

FIELD.NAME: incorrectfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any incorrect response.

FIELD.NAME: shownumcorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, then when the user gets the question partially correct, tell them how many choices they got correct alongside the feedback.
